A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was honestly worse than The Force Awakens. The plot was confusing and had one or a couple holes in it. The movie was slow and it had almost no action in it. Luke Skywalker isn't what he used to be\, but (!!!!!SPOILER ALERT!!!!!)\nwhen it was revealed Luke wasn't actually there fighting with Kylo Ren and he was actually creating a copy of himself keeping Kylo Ren busy\, that was cool. The movie had some cool parts\, but it isn't enough to salvage the entire movie. Honestly\, I am a bit dissapointed
